short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay secure by browsing online with SentraIPDB.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used to secure your browsing in Chrome. You will get a notification if you are on an reported Domain / Website IP that has been listed in our database.
